scripts.unix-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rm -r dist && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json && npm run copy
scripts.showcase: npm run unix-package && rm -r ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../extended-pdf-viewer-showcase/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.issue: npm run unix-package && rm -r ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer-issues/issue556-non-numeric-zoom/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && cp -R dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer ../ngx-extended-pdf-viewer-issues/issue556-non-numeric-zoom/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer
scripts.win-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rmdir dist /S && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json && xcopy /S/E/-Y projects\ngx-extended-pdf-viewer\src\assets dist\ngx-extended-pdf-viewer\assets\
scripts.release: npm run unix-package && cd dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm publish
scripts.copy: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-bleeding-edge && npm run copy-changelog
